name: GTR Drift Fever
description:
THE MOST DESIRED GTR CARS DRIFT GAME
5 different drift tracks and 1 city tracks are ready ! Also there are 15 most wanted realistic drift car models..
Stunning graphics, Wide range of unique sports cars, realistic driving experience, real drift skills.

SINGLEPLAYER
- Make best drift drive and finish level. get best score
- Get access to 15 sports cars and new tracks;
-Drive Fast ! Remember, police car pursuit you!

DRIFT-RACING SIMULATORS
Get ready to experience the most unique drifting thrill. Drifting has never been as fun, exciting and intense.

15 UNIQUE CARS!
Realistic drifting system and high quality car are awaiting. GTR ,E46M3, M4, Charger, Civici, Viper, Supra, Evo, C63, 350z, WRx.

RADIO OPTION
You can listen radio when you want!

SLOW MOTION!
with this behavior you can do your best fantastic action with your Car.

RECORD GAME!
Finish Level playing and watch your best performance repeat.

MULTIPLE CAMERA ANGLES!
You can choose from three different point of views: driver's pov, rear pov and basic cinematic angle.
